name: fontbakery-dashboard
description: Javascript modules of the Font Bakery dashboard.

scripts.prepare: bower install --allow-root && browserify ./browser/js/bower_components/jiff/jiff.js -s jiff -o ./browser/js/bower_components/jiff/jiff.umd.js && browserify ./browser/js/bower_components/jiff/lib/jsonPointer -s jsonPointer -o ./browser/js/bower_components/jiff/jsonPointer.umd.js && mkdir -p ./browser/js/bower_components/protocolbuffers && browserify ./node_modules/protocolbuffers/shared_pb.js -s  protocolbuffers/shared_pb -o ./browser/js/bower_components/protocolbuffers/shared_pb.js

author: Lasse Fister <commander@graphicore.de>
